channel.title: problem with enigmail in workstation it can't create revocation certificate
channel.description:
hello
i have a problem when i wanted to create my revocation certificate in enigmail ( a plugin for Thunderbird)
it says:
thunderbird Operation: exec Name: /bin/dash Denied: x Logfile: /var/log/kern.log whonix
i put a part of the log ( it's too long)
Jul 2 15:17:15 host kernel: [ 512.219095] xor: using function: prefetch64-sse (36864.000 MB/sec) Jul 2 15:17:15 host kernel: [ 512.252819] Btrfs loaded Jul 2 15:29:49 host kernel: [ 1265.417148] audit: type=1400 audit(1499009389.434:8): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/bin/dash" pid=27577 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 15:29:49 host kernel: [ 1265.417473] audit: type=1400 audit(1499009389.434:9): apparmor="DENIED" operation="open" profile="thunderbird" name="/dev/vboxuser" pid=27550 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="rw" denied_mask="rw" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 15:29:51 host kernel: [ 1267.883004] audit: type=1400 audit(1499009391.902:10): apparmor="DENIED" operation="open" profile="thunderbird" name="/proc/27539/cmdline" pid=27539 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="r" denied_mask="r" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 15:29:51 host kernel: [ 1267.906604] audit: type=1400 audit(1499009391.926:11): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/usr/bin/kde4-config" pid=27596 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 15:29:51 host kernel: [ 1267.963774] audit: type=1400 audit(1499009391.986:12): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/usr/bin/kde4-config" pid=27597 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 16:27:09 host kernel: [ 4700.685733] Chrome_ChildThr[16304]: segfault at 0 ip 800966a0 sp b05fea00 error 6 in plugin-container[80092000+21000] Jul 2 16:38:09 host kernel: [ 5358.843542] audit: type=1400 audit(1499013489.118:13): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/bin/dash" pid=22430 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 16:38:09 host kernel: [ 5358.844394] audit: type=1400 audit(1499013489.118:14): apparmor="DENIED" operation="open" profile="thunderbird" name="/dev/vboxuser" pid=22429 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="rw" denied_mask="rw" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 16:38:10 host kernel: [ 5360.160855] audit: type=1400 audit(1499013490.434:15): apparmor="DENIED" operation="open" profile="thunderbird" name="/proc/22418/cmdline" pid=22418 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="r" denied_mask="r" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 16:38:10 host kernel: [ 5360.170053] audit: type=1400 audit(1499013490.442:16): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/usr/bin/kde4-config" pid=22472 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 16:38:10 host kernel: [ 5360.227773] audit: type=1400 audit(1499013490.502:17): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" profile="thunderbird" name="/usr/bin/kde4-config" pid=22473 comm="thunderbird" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 17:02:11 host kernel: [ 6799.056641] audit: type=1400 audit(1499014931.526:18): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0xA9DBA589D834BB55_rev.asc" pid=29884 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:02:30 host kernel: [ 6817.991042] audit: type=1400 audit(1499014950.494:19): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0xA9DBA589D834BB55_rev.asc" pid=30189 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:02:38 host kernel: [ 6826.132354] audit: type=1400 audit(1499014958.646:20): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0xA9DBA589D834BB55_rev.asc" pid=30219 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:02:43 host kernel: [ 6831.227989] audit: type=1400 audit(1499014963.742:21): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0xA9DBA589D834BB55_rev.asc" pid=30249 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:05:05 host name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0x4D49B4058CC16E05_rev.asc" pid=30928 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:05:10 host kernel: [ 6977.327165] audit: type=1400 audit(1499015110.074:23): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0x4D49B4058CC16E05_rev.asc" pid=31070 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:06:54 host kernel: [ 7081.362483] audit: type=1400 audit(1499015214.262:24): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0x4D49B4058CC16E05_rev.asc" pid=31595 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:10:50 host kernel: [ 7317.663057] audit: type=1400 audit(1499015450.930:25): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mprotect" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/usr/bin/gpgconf" pid=1647 comm="gpgconf" requested_mask="r" denied_mask="r" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 Jul 2 17:13:43 host kernel: [ 7490.111579] audit: type=1400 audit(1499015623.638:26): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" name="/home/user/.thunderbird/cupacu7h.default/0x8A078E95CA62B60E_rev.asc" pid=2467 comm="gpg2" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Jul 2 17:20:04 host kernel: [ 7870.162730] audit: type=1400 audit(1499016004.274:27): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mknod" profile="thunderbird//gpg2" what can i do ?
thank you so much

item.title: problem with enigmail in workstation it can't create revocation certificate
item.dc:creator: y010
item.description:
hello

i have a problem when i wanted to create my revocation certificate in enigmail ( a plugin for Thunderbird)

it says:

thunderbird Operation: exec Name: /bin/dash Denied: x Logfile: /var/log/kern.log whonix

item.source: problem with enigmail in workstation it can't create revocation certificate
